20101210184839.143|20101210184840.571|CCO|DIFFERENT PATTERNS OF HAIR LOSS,

20101210184842.000|20101210184843.667|CCO|RECESSION.
20101210184843.667|20101210184845.333|CCO|AND THEY'LL SEE THE HAIR LINE 
20101210184845.333|20101210184847.000|CCO|RECEDING AND LOSS IN THE CROWN.

20101210184852.000|20101210184853.429|CCO|CAN LOSE IT OVER THE WHOLE

20101210184856.286|20101210184857.714|CCO|HAIR LOSS IN WOMEN. 
20101210184857.714|20101210184859.143|CCO|SO THERE'S ONE CALLED TELOGEN 
20101210184859.143|20101210184900.571|CCO|EFFLUVIUM SCALP.
20101210184900.571|20101210184902.000|CCO|THIS IS NOT A TRUE HAIR LOSS.
